title: RosettaConstructionHashResponse
description: TransactionIdentifier contains the transaction_identifier of a transaction that was submitted to either /construction/hash or /construction/submit.

transaction_identifier.title: TransactionIdentifier
transaction_identifier.description: The transaction_identifier uniquely identifies a transaction in a particular network and block or in the mempool.

hash.description: Any transactions that are attributable only to a block (ex: a block event) should use the hash of the block as the identifier.
